title: Application Information API
description: Use this service to get information about a specific application.
tokens: overview application information api used get detailed about specific this includes status request id accepted hmlr reference once previously known abr priority timestamp any errors that prevented submission warnings did prevent need addressed before caseworker can process otherwise requisition may occur list correspondence records associated with including completion documents cancellation requsition more after receiving notification indicating changed which notifications will available visit section submit page view technical guide specification web version opens new tab how works interaction diagram demonstrates support users using their unique provided via user examples type are listed system respond relevant also by informing been onto day failed validation state submitted when starts there several potential outcomes each trigger different response include passed added awaiting closed reopens case indicate whether error occurred must correct resubmit test created environment ve example code demonstrate what should expect developing your own services stubs please note plans release sandbox developers future exact date confirmed general testing guidance our

title: Send a document API
description: Use this service to attach documents to your application.
tokens: overview send document api should used attach documents your application there are two steps sending request generate upload url will respond with hmlr that can this only active 10 minutes after creation endpoint also return id when using submit uploaded via process subject security scanning have been 180 days which point they removed view technical guide specification web version opens new tab how works diagram demonstrates support users user sends system then use test does currently provide environment integrators our business gateway apis instead ve provided example code demonstrate what expect see developing own services stubs please note plans release sandbox developers future exact date confirmed general testing guidance visit
